# Welcome to My Portfolio

Hello! My name is **Christian Fisher**, and I am currently a graduate student at the **University of Charleston** in West Virginia. I recently earned my undergraduate degree in **Business Analytics** with a concentration in **Sports Business**. Over the past four years, I have achieved numerous accomplishments both academically and athletically as a **Division II football player**.

With a **3.97 GPA**, I have demonstrated a strong commitment to academic excellence while excelling as a starter and leader on the football field. Balancing college athletics and academics has equipped me with invaluable skills, including **time management**, **leadership**, and **self-discipline**.

This repository serves as a platform to showcase my analytical skills and knowledge through class assignments and projects. You can find my **LinkedIn profile** in the top right corner for additional details about my professional journey.
